[short] skip
env GOPROXY=direct
env GO111MODULE=on
env GOPRIVATE=github.com

go mod init x
go get github.com/born2ngopi/hello
go mod vendor

go work use -r .
cmp go.work go.work.want

-- main.go --
package main

import "github.com/born2ngopi/hello"

func main() {
	hello.SayHello()
}
-- go.work --
go 1.19

use .
-- go.work.want --
go 1.19

use .
